64dp VR ENGINEERS Settings ///// Youtube Video thumbnail image view Close Player activity
YouTube
Simple PlayerView YouTube App Launcher Intents This is a YouTubePlayerView! This is a YouTubePlayerFragment!
Please select a demo: * Your device is currently running Android API version %1$s.
Requires Android API version %1$s or higher. This intent is not supported with the currently installed version of YouTube.
YouTube version installed on this device: %1$s. YouTube is not installed on this device. This is a demo which shows how to handle fullscreen behaviour. This activity has differents layouts for portrait, landscape and fullscreen. The user can enter fullscreen either by using the player controller or programmatically by the programmer (here using a button). If your activity does not have a landscape layout, you can choose to automatically enter fullscreen when the device is rotated to landscape orientation. Enter Fullscreen
Always fullscreen in landscape This is a demo which shows how to use the ActionBar as an overlay when the video is playing in fullscreen. The actionbar will automatically fade away along with the player controls when the video is being played in fullscreen. While not in fullscreen the Actionbar is visible and does not overlay any of the views. There was an error initializing the YouTubeThumbnailView (%1$s)
There was an error initializing the YouTubePlayer (%1$s)
